entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET Framework 4.8 Class Library compatibility issue with Azure.Storage.Blob package #93177
  • Deadlock in ThreadPool.GetMaxThreads() during app start. #93175
  • ISimdVector issue (GVM resolution doesn't report [Intrinsic]?) #93174
    9.0.0
  • Follow-Up: Issue-URL Cleanup #93172
  • 8.0.0-rc.1 Library not loaded: /System/Library/Frameworks/CryptoKit.framework/Versions/A/CryptoKit #93167
    Future
  • Test failure Interop/StructMarshalling/ReversePInvoke/MarshalSeqStruct/ReversePInvoke/ReversePInvokeTest/ReversePInvokeTest.sh #93166
  • Test failure readytorun/JittedMethodsCountingTest/JittedMethodsCountingTest/JittedMethodsCountingTest.sh #93163
  • Test failure GC\\Features\\HeapExpansion\\plug\\plug.cmd #93162
  • Cannot use ConfigurationBinder source generator with a type that has a string ctor parameter with default value #93159
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Test failure Loader/binding/tracing/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.sh #93161
  • Test failure JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/Serialization/Deserialize/Deserialize.dll #93165
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_461649/DevDiv_461649/DevDiv_461649.cmd #93164
  • Test failure: SendAsync_SlowServerRespondsAfterDefaultReceiveTimeout_ThrowsHttpRequestException #20675
    9.0.0
  • Publishing with AOT for `linux-musl-x64` links an incorrect interpreter #93158

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono][amd64] Pass SIMD arguments in SIMD registers. #93182
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add new nativeaot files to the platform manifest #93181
    blocking-official-build, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Update comment with min OS version locations to update #93180
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • SPMI: Fix 'misses' fraction computation and calculate total contexts correctly #93179
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add missing readonly modifiers to GCHandle and DependentHandle #93178
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix clsHnd in impImportCall #93176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Obsolete `AuthenticationManager` of `System.Net.Requests` #93171
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix TensorPrimitives.IndexOfXx corner-case when first element is seed value #93169
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Consolidate a few exception throws in TensorPrimitives #93168
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Fix Decimal literal formatting in source generators #93160
    area-Extensions-Configuration

Merged

  • [mono] Update emsdk #93170
    area-Workloads, needs-area-label
  • [mono] Use C11 _Noreturn (or [[noreturn]]) instead of GCC attribute #93131
    area-Build-mono
  • Change SendAsync_SlowServerRespondsAfterDefaultReceiveTimeout_ThrowsHttpRequestException server to Loopback #93025
    area-System.Net.Http

Updated

  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Merge CoreMangLib, Exceptions and Interop folders #91901
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix Options Source Gen Trimming Issues #93088
    area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Optimize Ordinal.EqualsIgnoreCase_Vector with AVX2 and AVX512 #93116
    area-System.Runtime
  • Fix a memory leak in runtime interop stubs when using an array of structs of types that use old-style managed marshalers #93089
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • JIT: Support retbuf optimization for non 'lvIsTemp' locals #93071
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update JIT debug helpers #93086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use our now-split MarshalAs parsing to simplify our "forwarder with marshalling attributes" logic #93157
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Permissive handling for runtimeconfig.json #92037
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Address feedback from config binding gen PR to improve enum parsing #89952
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add support for byte/sbyte SIMD multiplication on XArch #86811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Avoid a few array allocations with DefaultBinder #93115
    area-System.Reflection
  • [release/7.0] Fix max chunk size limiting #81607
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Update APICompat suppression files to ignore TFMs #93129
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • feat(83547): Adding escaping of property name for GetPath. #84688
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 9.0.0
